sentences.en: ...drawing a small picture with coloured chalk.
sentences.cn: …用彩色粉笔画一幅小画。

sentences.en: a book with pictures in it
sentences.cn: 带插图的书

sentences.en: A close look at the statistics reveals a troubling picture.
sentences.cn: 仔细看过统计数据后，会发现情况令人担忧。

sentences.en: A picture of Rory O'Moore hangs in the dining room at Kildangan.
sentences.cn: 一幅罗里·奥穆尔的画像挂在基尔丹根的餐厅里。

sentences.en: But as with other charitable bodies, these figures mask the true picture.
sentences.cn: 但和其他慈善机构一样，这些数字掩盖了实情。

sentences.en: Grace Robertson started as a photographer with Picture Post in 1947.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯·罗伯逊于1947年参加工作，做了《图片邮报》杂志的一名摄影师。

sentences.en: He asked her permission to paint her picture (= paint a picture of her ) .
sentences.cn: 他请求她允许为她画像。

sentences.en: He described the picture as his most cherished possession.
sentences.cn: 他说那幅画是他最珍爱的财产。

sentences.en: His picture was plastered all over the newspapers on the weekend.
sentences.cn: 他的照片占据了周末报纸的头版。

sentences.en: hostages were better left out of the picture.
sentences.cn: 最好不让人质知道底细。

sentences.en: How had this com-promising picture come into the possession of the press?
sentences.cn: 这张令人难堪的照片是怎么落到媒体手中的？

sentences.en: I decided to crop the picture just above the water line.
sentences.cn: 我决定把这张照片水印以下的部分裁掉。

sentences.en: I tried to put the picture from my mind.
sentences.cn: 我试图将这幅画面从脑海中抹去。

sentences.en: Most patients derive enjoyment from leafing through old picture albums.
sentences.cn: 大多数病人都很喜欢翻看旧相册。

sentences.en: she looked a picture of health.
sentences.cn: 她仿佛就是健康的化身。

sentences.en: She visualized him stomping to his car, the picture of self-righteousness.
sentences.cn: 她想象着他噔噔噔地走向车子，一副自以为是的模样。

sentences.en: That’s a great picture of you, Dad!
sentences.cn: 你的那张照片拍得真好，爸爸！

sentences.en: The picture will now appear, as if by magic!
sentences.cn: 这幅画立刻就会出现，好像变魔术一般！

sentences.en: The room had several pictures on the walls.
sentences.cn: 那个房间墙上有几幅画。

sentences.en: They agreed to bid the picture up to 4,500 francs.
sentences.cn: 他们同意将这幅画的价格提至4,500法郎。

sentences.en: This picture shows the view from a car using normal dipped lights.
sentences.cn: 这幅图片显示的是从一辆使用正常近光灯的汽车上所看到的景色。

sentences.en: You can have your picture taken with a cutout of David Beckham.
sentences.cn: 你可以和戴维·贝克汉姆的纸板模型合影。

words.tran_cn: 独特的；生动的；别致的；图画般的
照片，图画；影片；景色；化身

phrases.tran_cn: 大图像；重点；（事情的）主要部分；特种宽银幕电影
照相；落井钻具顶部打模
是…的化身；与…非常相像；十足…的样子
逼真模式；栩栩如生的描写
文字图片；精彩生动的口头描述

trans.tran_cn: 照片，画像，图画，图片，影片，情况，描述，印象
trans.tran_en: shapes, lines etc painted or drawn on a surface, showing what someone or something looks like
shapes, lines etc painted or drawn on a surface, showing what someone or something looks like
to show someone or something in a photograph, painting, or drawing

trans.tran_cn: 构想，想象，用图片显示，描述，描写
